title: Dale Tuggy and Bill Schlegel Discuss the Prologue of John
description:
Dr. Dale Tuggy and Bill Schlegel discuss two different Biblical Unitarian interpretations of the Prologue of John (John 1:1-14). Dale defends what might be called the "Genesis Beginnings" interpretation or what I call "Personified Logos with a soft incarnation" interpretation. Bill argues for the "New Beginnings" view. 

Dale Tuggy is an Analytic Philosopher of Religion. He hosts the "Trinities" Podcast. He has a lot of great content on the Philosophy and History of christology and other theological topics.  
Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/khanpadawan
Blog: https://trinities.org/blog/

Bill Schlegel is a Professor in Exile. Formerly of Masters University Bill was unceremoniously removed from his long-time position after changing his mind on the trinity. Bill is also the host of the "One God Report", a podcast delving deep into biblical passages about christology.
See his and his wife's amazing testimony video here. https://www.youtube.com/watch?edufilter=NULL&v=9LA9Uq-8xMc
Podcast blog: http://www.onegodreport.com/
